headlines.description: Substitute Josh Dasilva scored a superb equaliser with four minutes remaining as Brentford came from two goals down to draw 2-2 with Leicester City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dasilva scores late as Brentford rally for 2-2 draw at Leicest

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Manchester United

headlines.description: — New manager, same old problems for Manchester United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United loses 2-1 to Brighton in Ten Hag's 1st EPL game

events.name: Manchester City at West Ham United

headlines.description: Erling Haaland scored a brace on his Premier League debut as Manchester City beat West Ham United 2-0 at the London Stadium on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haaland snags brace on Premier League debut
